general:
Pick a card.
 Read it out loud to your partner(s) and listen to their answer.

level_one.label: Level 1 - Perception
level_one.content: This level is about gaining perspective on what first impressions we give off and challenging the assumptions we make about others.

level_two.label: Level 2 - Connection
level_two.content: This round is about asking the rarely asked questions and connecting on a deeper level.

level_three.label: Level 3 - Reflection
level_three.content: Time to reflect on your game experience.

wildcard.label: Wildcard
wildcard.content: If you draw a wildcard, your partner must complete the instructions unless otherwise stated.
